resources.string: Develop your memory by going through different levels and tasks.
Develop high-speed memory due to time constraints. Combine your indicators with other users.
Develop your personal training and develop your memory even faster.
Click on the screen to proceed to the tasks.
Memorize and display the arrangement of the figures
Remember, combine and display the arrangement of the figures
Memorize and display the specified arrangement of figures
Congratulations. You have been trained. In the event of difficulties with the passage of any level or job, use the training mode.
Your current progress has been saved. Please choose the next action…
Display the location of the shapes
Hello, if you liked our application and you are interested in its development, spend a minute of your time to leave your assessment and feedback.
The figure appears on the screen 2 times with a time interval. After they disappear, display the selected location (the location number will appear on the screen)
The figure will appear on the screen 2 times with an interval in time. After they disappear, display the general layout, aligning the position of the figures at the first and second appearance.
The figure will appear on the screen. Remember their location. After they disappear, display the location of these figures on the field.
Congratulations. Now all the premium features of the Librain application are available to you. Good game!
Игра закончена. Ваш результат был сохранён. Выберите следущее действие
